message:
‎"... as the fledgling nanotech industry emerges alongside the 'war on terrorism', a trajectory towards a nano surveillance society is coming worryingly into focus. One leading nano-commentator... has given it a name: the nano-panopticon--describing the emergence of a future without privacy in which every aspect of society will be tracked, measured & visible from the bottom up."

http://www.via3.net/pooled/articles/BF_DOCART/view.asp?Q=BF_DOCART_87151
